title: Tic-Tac-Toe - Paper Watch Face
summary: Get a tic-tac-toe game right on your wrist in this fun & functional watch face.
developerAddress: Ukraine, 02081, Kiev, Darnitskij area, Anna Akhmatova street, 22, office 4009

descriptionHTML:
🕊️Fun, interactive watch face with multiple useful functions + integrated Tic-Tac-Toe minigame.
Awesome hand-drawn design with notebook paper background and matching smart ambient mode.

🌟Main features:
• Fun Tic-Tac-Toe minigame;
• Cartoony, special hand-drawn design;
• Interactive functional shortcuts:
- Find my phone;
- Alarm clock;
- Flashlight (lantern);
• Pigeon animation;
• Smart ambient mode;
• Battery life indicator;
• Displays current day and date.

⌚Is it for me?
Tic-Tac-Toe is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 3;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG Watch Style;
✔ LG Watch Sport;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ Huawei Watch 2;
✔ Polar M600;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, S2 and S3 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Tic-Tac-Toe Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Not sure if ready to buy? Try out this watch face in our Collection app for free! - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.boost.watchcore 🙊
comments: Love it After one week, now I decided to give a review, it looks stunning on a rounded watch, and ok on square watch
Great face! Excellent to look at and fantastic battery consumption! Highly recommended
Great Face Don't like the bird... but still give it 5 stars

Nice and Original but... It doesn't load the weather app and it says it can't find the flashlight app. Once you go into the alarm there's no swiping that will get you out of it (thank goodness my watch has a hardware button). The app shortcut icons are VERY small and difficult to accurately press. It also took me a while to figure out what they were because they are so small. Sorry, had to refund it.
